<rule id="springboot-cloud-config-client-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-config-client" groupId="org.springframework.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-cloud-config-client" groupId="org.springframework.cloud"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Spring Cloud Config Client artifact with Quarkus 'quarkus-spring-cloud-config-client' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the Spring Cloud Config Client artifact with Quarkus `quarkus-spring-cloud-config-client` extension

                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-spring-cloud-config-client`.
                        
                        A change may also be required to the code and configuration.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-cloud-config-client" title="Quarkus - Reading properties from Spring Cloud Config server"/>
                    <link href="https://cloud.spring.io/spring-cloud-config/reference/html/" title="Spring Cloud Config"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
